officialTitle: Efficacy of Exparel (TM) on Post-operative Pain After Laparoscopic Gastric Bypass Using Circular EEA Stapler
inclusionCriteria:
* bariatric surgery patients
* laparoscopic roux-en-y gastric bypass
* use of EEA stapler anastomosis
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* age \<18 years
* previous history of roux-en-y gastric bypass
* patients undergoing other bariatric procedures
* pre-operative opioid analgesics
